name: Soft Shape Waterproof Lip Liner
about: What it is:  A comfortable, creamy, waterproof lip pencil that glides with precision and controlled application..Formulation Type: Lip Liner.Highlighted Ingredients: - Marula Oil: Creates a creamy formula without any drag..- Shea Butter: Nourishes lips..- Vitamin E: Moisturizes lips...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This creamy lip liner gives you precise, controlled application, perfect-match lip tone definition, and waterproof wearu2013in five flattering shades. Whether you love a 90's look with contrasting liner or prefer to match with your Lip Treatment Oil, we have your perfect combo.
ingredients: -Marula Oil: Creates a creamy formula without any drag..-Shea Butter: Nourishes lips..-Vitamin E: Moisturizes lips...Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Mica, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Myristyl Esters, Polyethylene, C10-18 Triglycerides, Hydrogenated Cottonseed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Decyl Esters, Euphorbia Cerifera (Candelilla) Wax/Candelila Cera/Cire De Candelilla, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Cera Carnauba/Cire De Carnauba, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate (+/-): Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 30 (CI 73360).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Outline lips to your desired shape, working inward toward the center..-For a pronounced statement, use liner to color in lips..-Apply Hydrating Lip Treatment Oil (sold separately) on top for comfortable shine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m beginning to not trust any product review on Sephora. I filtered out all incentivized reviews and purchased the Rose Clay color hoping this would be a natural, long lasting lip liner. Upon arrival, it looks nothing like the photos. It is actually a light brown color on the stick and on my lips, hand, and wrist, it is a nasty yellowish orange. No rose tones whatsoever. The only good thing? It wasnu2019t long lasting at all. Wouldnu2019t recommend this liner.
